title: 127. Food Safety Testing | Brand Label Transparency & Accountability Using QR Code | FoodID
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Kevin Lo, the chief executive officer of food safety platform FoodID. Barron and Lo explore the ins and outs of food transparency.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
